channel.title: [pi] defence level on god armor
channel.description:
is there a neater/not so much coding way to have it so zammy, sara, guthix rune armor needs defence that putting it like
ifnamehas "zammy" ifname has "plate" return 40 defence
there a better way to string it?

item.title: [pi] defence level on god armor
item.dc:creator: @voetbal645 voetbal645
item.description:
@voetbal645 wrote:

Go to itemassistant.java
look for

scroll down u will see something like this
case ID:
case ID:
c.defenceLevelReq = LVL NEED;
just copy this add the ids and lvl that u need in ur problem is that like 40

and add it underneath a line

Read full topic
